metadata.inclusion:
If you want to manually include the device, press the button for 3 times to include the device.
LED Status: Blue LED Solid light
metadata.exclusion:
If you want to manually exclude the device, press the button for 3 times to exclude the device.
LED Status: Green LED 1 sec. flashes 1 times
metadata.reset:
The Device Reset Locally Notification Command is used to
advertise that the device will be reset to default.
Press the button 3 times in 2 sec., and hold it for more
than 3 sec.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary
controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
